title: An Act enhancing the effectiveness of nonprofits’ core mission work through full cost funding

abstracts.abstract: By Representatives Vargas of Haverhill and Domb of Amherst, a petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 3428) of Andres X. Vargas and Mindy Domb for legislation to provide that certain grants or contracts allow for reimbursement of indirect costs.  State Administration and Regulatory Oversight.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on State Administration and Regulatory Oversight

related_entities.name: committee on State Administration and Regulatory Oversight

actions.description: Hearing scheduled for 11/05/2025 from 10:30 AM-01:00 PM in A-2
Hearing rescheduled to 11/05/2025 from 10:30 AM-01:00 PM in B-2                                               and Virtual Hearing location changed
